options.fig.cap: Figure 1: Overview map of the Metro Bike Share stations in Los Angeles and the research area of this project (blue).
options.label: unnamed-chunk-70

options.fig.cap: Figure 2: A first plot of the distances and the durations of bike trips in cluster A to get a better understanding of the data (without return trips).
options.label: unnamed-chunk-72

options.fig.cap: Figure 3: Balance of trips starting (positive) and ending (negative) at all stations.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-74

options.fig.cap: Figure 4: Balance of trips starting (positive) and ending (negative) at Union Station West Portal and Main & 1st.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-75

options.fig.cap: Figure 5: Map of cumulative trip ratio showing the difference between trips arriving and trips departing from a station. The blue dots show stations where many bike trips end, the red dots represent stations many people start their trip from.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-76

options.fig.cap: Figure 6: Map of bike stations and metro stations and the convex hull (red).
options.label: unnamed-chunk-77

options.fig.cap: Figure 7: Histogram of the density of shortest distances from bike station to metro station.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-79

options.fig.cap: Figure 8: Map of bike stations that lie within the metro station buffers. The circles that can be activated represent the absolute number of bike trips starting at these bike stations.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-80

options.fig.cap: Figure 9: The average number of trips per day type (weekday-day vs. weekend-day).
options.label: unnamed-chunk-83

options.fig.cap: Figure 10: The average number of trips on each day of the week.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-84

options.fig.cap: Figure 11: An analysis of electric and standard bikes in terms of different movement parameters.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-94

options.fig.cap: Figure 12: The number of trips by commuters and tourists over the course of a day.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-93

options.fig.cap: Figure 13: The number of trips over the course of a day (average). Comparing commuters and tourists.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-89

options.fig.cap: Figure 14: The number of trips per day of the week (average) the course of a day. Comparing commuters and tourists.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-90
